Literature.Title: Discovery of two skin-derived dermaseptins and design of a TAT-fusion analogue with broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity and low cytotoxicity on healthy cells.
Literature.Author: Zhu H, Ding X, Li W, Lu T, Ma C, Xi X, Wang L, Zhou M, Burden R, Chen T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>512 µM,Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:IC50=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=128µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=256µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=>512µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=256µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=>512µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MBC=64µM),Human squamous lung carcinoma NCI-H157(IC50=>100µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=>100µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=>100µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-435S(IC50=>100µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=>100µM)
